item.title: Trump Hits Musk Where It Hurts and Kills California’s EV Mandate
item.description: President Trump’s energy agenda remains largely uninterested in the future effects of climate change and more focused on fossil fuels.

item.title: In Just 3 Words, Jamie Dimon Spells Out Who Should Be Fired
item.description: Critics of the sometimes-salty JPMorgan Chase CEO say his advice might put him in the same disfavored group he called out.

item.title: Why Starbucks Is Bucking the Trend and Hiring More Managers
item.description: In an AI-driven era when some big brands are ditching mid-level staff, Starbucks is trying something to revive its fortunes.

item.title: Trade War Impacts Keep Jobless Claims at 8-Month High
item.description: A steady rise in layoffs has economists concerned about the labor market and the broader economy.

item.title: Researchers Just Found a Big Security Flaw in Microsoft’s AI. Here’s Why Businesses Should Worry
item.description: Microsoft’s been inserting AI everywhere it can, including into some of the world’s most popular business productivity apps.
